name: Fragment 8
description:
Fragment 8 is a VR platformer prototype aiming to provide freedom of movement while being highly comfortable with no motion sickness.

Dash, jump, climb and fly, avoid enemies and find your way in the one level provided in this prototype!

It's the native Quest version of Fragment 7.

Feedbacks welcome :)

Warning: When starting the flying movement, it's better to look straight in front of you and not tilting your head upward too much. :)

Be careful that your guardian floor must be correctly setup in order to have proper dash detection as its (partly) based on your head distance to floor!
